name: Adelynn's Jungle Memory Safari
description: A fun and educational jungle animal memory matching game for children. Help Adelynn discover and learn about jungle animals by matching pairs of animal cards!
author: Bradley Virtual Solutions, LLC
features: 12 unique jungle animals with educational facts

animals.name: Bengal Tiger
animals.fact: Tigers are excellent swimmers and love to cool off in water!

animals.name: Spider Monkey
animals.fact: Spider monkeys can swing through trees at speeds up to 35 mph!

animals.name: Scarlet Macaw
animals.fact: Macaws can live up to 100 years and mate for life!

animals.name: Asian Elephant
animals.fact: Elephants can recognize themselves in mirrors and mourn their dead!

animals.name: Jaguar
animals.fact: Jaguars have the strongest bite force of any big cat!

animals.name: Toucan
animals.fact: A toucan's colorful beak helps regulate their body temperature!

animals.name: Three-toed Sloth
animals.fact: Sloths only come down from trees once a week to go to the bathroom!

animals.name: Emerald Tree Boa
animals.fact: These snakes change color from red to green as they mature!

animals.name: Poison Dart Frog
animals.fact: These tiny frogs are among the most toxic animals on Earth!

animals.name: Blue Morpho
animals.fact: Blue Morpho wings aren't actually blue - they reflect light to appear blue!

animals.name: American Crocodile
animals.fact: Crocodiles haven't changed much in 200 million years!

animals.name: Hippopotamus
animals.fact: Hippos spend up to 16 hours a day in water to keep cool!

easy.description: Perfect for beginners - 6 animal pairs to match

medium.description: Intermediate challenge - 8 animal pairs to match

hard.description: Expert level - 12 animal pairs to match

installation.mobile: Add to home screen from browser menu
installation.desktop: Install as PWA from browser menu
